nodes.text: Garth Ezzar's speeder bike was a speeder bike that was owned by the Dark Jedi Garth Ezzar. It resembled Darth Maul's speeder bike, the Bloodfin, and was kept aboard Ezzar's Sith Infiltrator. He used it during the Destruction of the Almas Academy, where he flew it from his landing point in a ravine on Almas to the Almas Academy.
